def sum_special(arr):
    total_sum = sum(arr)
    cum_sum = 1
    result = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        total_sum -= arr[i]
        result += arr[i] * total_sum
    return result

def sum_special(arr):
    total_sum = sum(arr)
    cum_sum = -1
    result = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        total_sum -= arr[i]
        result += arr[i] * total_sum
    return result

def sum_special(arr):
    total_sum = sum(arr)
    cum_sum = 0
    result = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        total_sum -= arr[i]
        result += arr[i] ** total_sum
    return result
